title: News24.com | Coronavirus: We have a plan to curb spread of 'dire' virus in informal settlements, says Sisulu
description: The government insists there is a plan in place to address overcrowded areas which make social distancing and self-isolation impossible.
content:
The government insists there is a plan in place to address overcrowded areas which make social distancing and self-isolation impossible.
This is according to Human Settlements Minister Lindiwe Sisulu.
LIVE | Stop panic buying, there is no need to stockpile … [+2424 chars]
